channel.title: About on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in About on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: about
item.description: Leif Madsen has been an Asterisk consultant since 2004 and has been working with Asterisk since September, 2002. He is also co-author of the O’Reilly Media published books, Asterisk: The Future of Telephony 1st and 2nd editions (along with Jared Smith and Jim van Meggelen), Asterisk: The Definitive Guide (3rd edition) with Jim van Meggelen and Russell Bryant, and the Asterisk Cookbook with Russell Bryant. As an active member of the Asterisk community, Leif was formerly the primary issue marshal on the Asterisk issue tracker, in addition to the Asterisk release manager.
